name: Wolpertinger
movement: burrow 10 ft., fly 30 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: The Wolpertinger is a tiny monstrosity with a blend of whimsical features, capable of impressive jumps and possessing agility.
memorable: Its unique charge ability and keening shriek can affect combat dynamics significantly, providing a quirky challenge.
goals: To surprise and confuse adventurers, potentially causing chaos in encounters.
relations: Might coexist with other small creatures or fey-like beings.
environment: Often found in forested areas or locations suited for agile creatures.
strengths: Can fly, burrow, and has a charge attack that deals extra damage.
weaknesses: Low strength and intelligence, limiting physical power and cognitive capabilities.
attacks: Can inflict piercing damage with Bite and Gore attacks, and emit a deafening shriek with its Keening ability.
most_powerful_ability: Keening, which can deafens foes and frightens weaker beasts within earshot.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and has a passive perception score of 11.
additional_information: Exceptional movement options due to Flyby
Can jump great distances with Standing Leap
Low hit points make it vulnerable despite agility
Provides unique challenges in low-level encounters
test_queries: tiny whimsical creature that can fly
agile monster that jumps high and shrieks
elusive creature that can burrow and charge
quirky undermountain monster with keen abilities
fey-like tiny creature with unique combat tactics
